Notes: * Lists are allowed by using commas (e.g. "High,Medium") * Wildcards are allowed (e.g. "8.3%") {{velocity}} #set ($topSpace = $doc.documentReference.extractFirstReference('SPACE').getName()) $!xwiki.jsx.use("${topSpace}.Code.HomeGenerateReleaseNotes") {{html clean="false"}}
With Screenshots Without Screenshots
{{/html}} {{/velocity}}
